description:
Raphiel and Vigne get together to throw a human-style Christmas party. There`s just one little problem: how can they keep Satania from ruining Christmas?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Christmas and New Year`s Eve Surprise
Noël et le Nouvel An sont arrivés
Seiya to Misoka ni Nanka Kita
聖夜と晦日になんか来た
